name: Frontline Guardians
description:
In a time of crisis, brave heroes arise...

Evil Viruses are trying to invade the city. The front lines are now being breached, and no one seems brave enough to defend them. When everyone else backs down from the Evil Viruses, these fearless, courageous, and brave heroes face the challenge.

Introducing, Frontline Guardians!

Play as the unsung heroes of your city! Defend it from the Evil Viruses. Use various disinfecting weapons to sanitize them out of existence!

-------

Frontline Guardians is developed during these trying times. While in quarantine, we decided to create a game to honor our dear frontliners. We appreciate you all! This one's for you!

Credits:

Design, Art - Gelo Ventenilla

Art, Animation - Mari Cruz

Programming - Grace Fernandez, Mark Dimacuha

Music, SFX - Zapsplat.com
